charts.name: Desviación tiempo de Ciclo Actual vs Objetivo

queries.query:
from(bucket: "my-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "KEU2A21-----BS1---KFU1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "122110RB1_FB_SEAT_STAT.122110RB1.T_Ciclo_ACT" or r["_field"] == "122110RB1_FB_SEAT_STAT.122110RB1.T_Ciclo_Medio")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        _time: r._time,
        T_Ciclo_ACT: r["122110RB1_FB_SEAT_STAT.122110RB1.T_Ciclo_ACT"],
        T_Ciclo_Medio: r["122110RB1_FB_SEAT_STAT.122110RB1.T_Ciclo_Medio"],
        Desviación: r["122110RB1_FB_SEAT_STAT.122110RB1.T_Ciclo_ACT"] - r["122110RB1_FB_SEAT_STAT.122110RB1.T_Ciclo_Medio"],
        Alerta: if r["122110RB1_FB_SEAT_STAT.122110RB1.T_Ciclo_ACT"] > 5.0 then "ALERTA" else "OK"  // Cambia el umbral según sea necesario
    }))
  |> yield(name: "Tiempos de Ciclo")

charts.name: Tiempo logístico de entrada y de salida

queries.query:
from(bucket: "my-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "KEU2A21-----BS1---KFU1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "122110RB1_FB_SEAT_STAT.122110RB1.T_LOG_IN_ACU")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "my-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "KEU2A21-----BS1---KFU1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "122110RB1_FB_SEAT_STAT.122110RB1.T_LOG_OUT_ACU")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "my-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "KEU2A21-----BS1---KFU1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "122110RB1_FB_SEAT_STAT.122110RB1.T_Paro_No_Programado" or r["_field"] == "122110RB1_FB_SEAT_STAT.122110RB1.T_Averia_ACU" or r["_field"] == "122110RB1_FB_SEAT_STAT.122110RB1.T_Ciclo_Logistico")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
